thread.title: Dimitri Payet merchandise still on sale at West Ham shop for knockdown prices
thread.title_full: Dimitri Payet merchandise still on sale at West Ham shop for knockdown prices

author: gsweet
title: Dimitri Payet merchandise still on sale at West Ham shop for knockdown prices
text:
CAN'T GET RID OF PAYET Dimitri Payet merchandise still on sale at West Ham shop for knockdown prices 
Some say good riddance to Payet...others might see his signed and framed replica shirt as a bargain at £150 instead of £350 By GEOFF SWEET Comments IS there a West Ham fan out there who still has a soft spot for Dimitri Payet? 
If so…read on. 4 Dimitri Payet has swapped his West Ham shirt for this one 
If not still read on and rekindle a happy memory or two of the time when you did admire the Frenchman before he kicked up a stink over wanting out of the club for which he ended up training with the kids. 
Keep up to date with ALL the West Ham news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The truth is you can still buy replica Payet items from the official West Ham store following his controversial £25million move back to Marseille . 
Once upon a time you could purchase his No 27 shirt, scarf and mug with his name on it. 
Now you can still get a Payet T-shirt at a knockdown £3 instead of its original £20 price tag. 4 Dimitri Payet has swapped his West Ham shirt for this one West Ham fans wipe their feet and spit on Dimitri Payet shirt as they come out of stadium And a replica first team shirt is now half price at £150 
And there is also Payet's 2016/17 signed and framed shirt, yours for only £150 instead of £350. Related Stories Chinese whispers Wayne Rooney's move to China may have to be approved by President Xi Jinping after crackdown on big-money transfers STAYING PUT Moussa Dembele to snub Chelsea, Arsenal and Real Madrid to see out four-year Celtic deal, according to agent Neym dropper Neymar spotted in London with Formula One star Lewis Hamilton and NFL ace Odell Beckham Jnr Ash to Ashes Manchester United star Ashley Young linked with shock move to Chinese Super League side Shandong Luneng Bon Appetit Chelsea and Manchester City ready to return for Leonardo Bonucci following his huge bust-up with boss Pet HATe 
Well, co-owner David Gold did say Payet was sold for less than he was worth . 
Maybe the same applies to his memorabilia? Or not... 
Since the grumbling, mumbling and general un-co-operative Payet left the Hammers their form has taken a marked upturn. PA:Press Association Payet as West Ham fans knew when they loved him... Dimitri Payet scores his first goal since returning to Marseille, albeit with a huge deflection 
And West Ham legend Geoff Hurst agrees they are better off without him. 
He said: “It always looked like they’d get £25m for him, that’s not too bad a deal at all considering we paid £10million for him. More importantly the unity of the team has proven the most important thing. 
“In one sense it’s sad to lose him but no matter how good you are if you behave like a prima donna and don’t want to play [it’s no great loss]."
